category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.VisibilityOptions
preference.preference_description: Defines the visibility options in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: ShowCarpet - Specifies whether the carpet is visible in the Time Way Planner view. ShowOperations - Controls the visibility of operations in Time Way Planner view. ShowProductImage - Controls the visibility of the product image on stations in the Time Way Planner view. ShowBoundaries - Controls the visibility of process area, line, and zone boundaries in the Time Way Planner view.
